snippet: While wearing a “masculine yet sexy” white jumpsuit, Rachel Lim, an owner of Love, Bonito, a fashion label, says that comfort and experimentation are key parts of Singaporean style.
abstract: Rachel Lim, spotted in Orchard Road area of Singapore, describes her personal style.
lead_paragraph: While wearing a “masculine yet sexy” white jumpsuit, Rachel Lim, an owner of Love, Bonito, a fashion label, says that comfort and experimentation are key parts of Singaporean style.

headline.main: Style on Orchard Road in Singapore
